QuestData.Title: Helcular's Rod Giveth...
QuestData.Description: To think, I, a master of necromancy, trained by Kel'Thuzad himself, was reduced to nothing more than a corpse in a grave. Thankfully, my astute apprentice, Thaivand, managed to find a group of heroes to recover this:$B$B<Helcular whips out his rod.>$B$BIt is through the power of the rod that I was reborn. The rod giveth and the rod taketh away!$B$BTake it now and use it to empower our dark rangers battling the worgen in the field north of us. Renew their vigor with my rod.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Helcular's Rod to Empower 8 Dark Rangers.
QuestData.CompletionText: I want that rod back when you're done.
QuestData.RewardText: As I said, the rod giveth to our dark rangers and doth taketh away from our enemy!
